backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with storage mixin, user/session/channel/message/document types, and various request/response variants for the backend.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old sessions to new format by adding empty membersChannels arrays while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-style summary file describing the purpose of multiple frontend components, hooks, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining theme variables for light and dark modes, including sidebar and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting early theme mode from localStorage and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing identity, user profile setup, session context, routing between Lobby and Session, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary component displaying a recovery UI with reload and clear-local-data options when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat UI component handling text and image messages, roll commands, and auto‑scrolling with upload progress.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamps, roll badges, and optional image previews.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Host document editor supporting saving, file uploads with validation, and embedding file markers.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Player-facing document editor allowing content edits, privacy toggling, and file uploads with validation.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Displays a user avatar with fallback initials and optional custom sizing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages uploading, previewing, and removing a user’s profile picture with validation and progress.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting session channels with form handling and backend actions.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking session documents using actor API calls with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements session export and import UI with file parsing, confirmation dialogs, and actor-based save/load operations.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Contains dialogs to create, rename, and delete members' channels using session data mutations with basic validation and error UI.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Defines dialogs and menus for creating, renaming, deleting, and toggling visibility of player-owned documents via player document hooks.
Displays a list of player documents, allows selecting or creating documents, and manages visibility and ownership information.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Renders a session sidebar listing channels and member channels with create/manage options and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Provides a settings page for themes, backgrounds, nicknames, and template import/reset before entering the lobby.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for various frontend update loops.
Implements a context for loading, saving, updating, and resetting user preferences including theme handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, and upload document files using the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Supplies hooks for CRUD operations on player documents with automatic query invalidation and polling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: A simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback at a specified interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the preferences context.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and poll session-related data and to mutate member channel records.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines hooks to load and update user profiles via an actor interface with React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific app-related entries from localStorage and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Creates, parses, inserts, and removes file reference markers within document text.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Handles creation, parsing, insertion, and removal of image markers in document content.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user UI preferences stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates basic dice roll command strings and reports simple errors.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Exports session data to a versioned JSON file, supports download and import with validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears session context values in localStorage.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates stored session templates in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements the lobby UI for hosting or joining sessions, including template application and identity handling.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: React page managing session state, channel/document selection, and header UI with dialogs and chat/editor views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, issues, and pending requests for session channels and document changes.
